main.name: Quintin Nguyen
main.bio: First and foremost, "Hello World". When I printed out my first "Hello World", I knew coding would be the start of sleepless nights, nonstop head scratches, and lots of stack overflow, but in the end, something I would love forever. In all seriousness, the idea of implementing software to solve practical problems has really captivated me. For example, I built a Java program that helped me solve my chemistry homework with ease because I built-in a periodic table and some equations that I could use to solve in the click of a button. Programming is a never-ending puzzle that I am passionately engaged in solving. I believe that programming can be used to make the world a better place.

work.title: Technical Specialist

work.description3: • Implemented front-end features for the internal portal, actively accessed by 100+ clients

work.description1: • Tutored 3 individual high school students for their AP Computer Science Exams and they were able to score 4’s and 5’s

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
